name: Cthyllamon
description: Cthyllamon resembles MarineAngemon , though instead is demonic. It is blue, has two short ears, yellow slanted eyes, a jagged mouth with staples closing part of it on either side, part of its arms is stapled to it with some sort of black material, its tail is covered in a bandage, it has a skull pattern on its chest, wears a belt around its neck, and has demonic wings.
